stimulusHtml: A toy cannon is fixed to a small cart and both move to the right with speed v along a straight track, as shown above. The cannon points in the direction of motion. When the cannon fires a projectile the cart and cannon are brought to rest. If M is the mass of the cart and cannon combined without the projectile, and m is the mass of the projectile, what is the speed of the projectile relative to the ground immediately after it is fired?
choicesHtml: ( M+m )v m MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C9D@

( M−m )v m MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CA8@

mv ( M ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AC9@

mv ( M−m ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CA8@
